Package onbon.y2.play

Y2 models for playing include the play list, the program, the standard areas, the audio, the bulletin and the dynamic area.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DynamicArea.Unit The unit displayed in the dynamic area.
TextArea.Page The page displayed in the text area.
TextualizeArea.Mask The page displayed in the text area.
 

Class Summary
AnimationArea The animation area.
AnimationEffect The animation effect.
AnimationEffectDirectable The animation effect with direction.
AnimationEffectFountain The animation effect of fountain.
Area The abstract area provides common functions to configure a area.
AreaBorderStyle The border style.
AudioArea The audio area.
AudioAreaFile The video area.
BulletinArea The bulletin area.
ChiCalendarArea The date and time area.
ChiCalendarAreaPage The page displays date, time and week inside the date and time area.
ClockArea The clock area.
ClockArea.TimeHandInfo  
CounterArea The counter area.
DateTimeArea The date and time area.
DateTimeAreaPage The page displays date, time and week inside the date and time area.
DateTimePattern The pattern of the date and time.
DynamicArea The dynamic area.
DynamicAreaTextUnit The text based page displayed in the dynamic area.
DynamicPlan The dynamic plan includes a command and all resources used by the command.
DynamicPlayFile The dynamic play file defines dynamic areas and how to play them on the screen.
MarqueeArea The marquee area displays single line text.
MarqueeAreaPage The page displays a single line text inside the marquee area.
PicArea The picture area.
PicAreaPage The page displays a picture in the picture area.
ProgramFile The program file defines the areas to be played.
ProgramPlayFile The program play file defines areas which to be played on the screen.
SensorTempArea The sensor area.
TextArea The text area.
TextAreaImagePage The page displays a image inside the text area.
TextAreaTextPage The page displays text inside the text area.
TextualizeArea The text area uses materials to draw colorful text.
TextualizeAreaImageMask The mask uses native image file.
TextualizeAreaMaterial The material is used to renderer text to display.
TextualizeAreaTextMask The mask uses text to create mask images.
VideoArea The video area.
VideoAreaPage The page plays a video inside the video area.
 

Enum Summary
AnimationEffectDirectable.DirectionType The direction type.
AreaBorderStyle.AnimationType The animation type.
BulletinArea.LayoutType The layout type.
ProgramPlayFile.PlayMode The play mode.
VideoArea.RotationType The rotation type.
 

Package onbon.y2.play Description

Y2 models for playing include the play list, the program, the standard areas, the audio, the bulletin and the dynamic area.
Standard Areas:

  • AnimationArea
  • ChiCalendarArea - developing
  • ClockArea - developing
  • CountArea - developing
  • DateTimeArea
  • MarqueeArea
  • PicArea
  • SensorNoiseArea - developing
  • SensorTempArea - developing
  • SensorWindArea - developing
  • SensorAirQtyArea - developing
  • TextArea
  • ViedoArea
Special Areas:
  • AudioArea
  • BulletinArea
  • DynamicArea
